isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - ACCESSORY POWER

svcproc.title: ACCESSORY POWER

item.para: Energizes the accessory adapter relay (145), applying power to A3 accessory adapter (501).
Flows to A1 Accessory Adapter (499) and to the Electric Wiper Intermittent Relay.
